project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement feature to load CSV file and check for numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate mean for selected numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate median for selected numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate mode for selected numerical columns
Write tests for the calculation features implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
